Post to Social Media

Post to company or individual social media pages right from Google Drive

This add-on allows users to create posts with text and image to social networks. It supports posting to Facebook Pages, Instagram Business accounts, both individual and organization accounts for Linkedin, and Twitter accounts. Through the add-on you can post the same image image you select to all of the above social networks with one click. If the image in Google Drive has Description in the metadata fields, the description will become the post text. It is also possible to change the text(i.e. make it shorter for Tweeter)

Posting to Facebook

The add-on supports posting to Facebook Pages only

Requirements

  • Authorize with an account that is owner of at least one Facebook Page
  • During Authorization select only 1 Facebook page for the app

Posting to Instagram

The add-on supports posting to Instagram business accounts only

Requirements

  • Make sure you have connected your Instagram page to your Facebook page
  • Authorize with the same account
  • During Authorization select only 1 Instagram business account<
  • Make sure you create an Imgur account too. The add-on will store the image you are posting as a private image to Imgur. Afterwards it will be posted to Instagram and deleted from Imgur

Posting to Twitter

The add-on works with any Twitter account

Posting to Linkedin

The add-on supports posting to both organization and individual pages

Requirements

  • No requirements for the individual Linkedin pages
  • If you want to post to an organization, you are required to authorize with an account that has admin rights to the organization
